title: Forklift SQL Input Glob Standard
description: Specify which schemas/tables to include from the SQL source using glob-like patterns. Patterns supported: '*.*' (all schemas/tables), 'table_name' (table in default schema), 'schema.table' (specific schema/table), 'schema.*' (all tables/views in schema). Database name is provided in the connection string.

items.description: Glob pattern for schema and table. Examples: '*.*', 'table_name', 'schema.table', 'schema.*'

include.description: List of glob patterns specifying which schemas/tables to include. If omitted, defaults to ['*.*'] (all).
